name: Ramen Salad
instructions: Remove the flavor packets from the Ramen and set aside.
Crumble the Ramen noodles and mix with the other ingredients in a large salad bowl.

other.name: Dressing
ul: 2 beef flavor packets set aside earlier
ol: Stir ingredients together in a small bowl.
Mix with salad just before serving (to keep the noodles from getting soggy).
